name: Olderfall
shortDescription: Lead your NFT gladiators to glory in this tactical auto-battler.
description: Olderfall is a free-to-play auto-battler set in a dystopian arena where gladiators fight for survival, prestige, and onchain rewards. As a Gladiator Master, you train procedurally generated warriors, collect powerful gear, and rise through weekly tournaments tracked directly on the blockchain. Built for real competition and long-term ownership, Olderfall blends fast-paced tactical combat with a frictionless Web3 experienceâ€”no wallet or downloads required. Jump in, lead your team, and earn your place among the legends.
